DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of quetiapine in the treatment of a major depressive episode in patients with bipolar disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Trial of the Use of Quetiapine Fumarate (SEROQUELÂ®) in the Treatment of Patients With Bipolar Depression
DOC.criteria: Written Informed Consent; Bipolar disorder with most recent episode depressed; Outpatient status Patients with a current Axis I disorder other than bipolar disorder within 6 months of screening; Patients whose current episode of depression exceeds 12 months or is less than 4 weeks
